mapper.insert: insert into t_user (uname, upwd, telephone, address, ulevel) values (#{user.uname}, #{user.upwd}, #{user.telephone}, #{user.address}, #{user.ulevel})
mapper.update: update t_user set uname = #{user.uname}, upwd = #{user.upwd}, telephone = #{user.telephone}, address = #{user.address}, ulevel = #{user.ulevel} where uid = #{id}
